func:
msg.payload = Buffer.from(msg.payload + "\r");
return msg;

name: Random sensor data

func:
array = [{x: 12,y: 18},{x: 6,y: 18},{x: 17,y: 21.5},{x: 3,y: 18}]
node.send({payload:array})


// remove last element from array
array.pop()
node.send({payload:array})

// add element to the end of the array

array.push({x: Math.round(Math.random()*25),y: Math.round(Math.random()*25)})
node.send({payload:array})

// add another element to the end of the array
array.push({x: Math.round(Math.random()*25),y: Math.round(Math.random()*25)})
node.send({payload:array})

msg.payload=global.get('samples') || [];
return msg;

global.set("timestamp", msg.timestamp);
return null;

name: Append Samples to CSV file and graph

func:
global.set('sample', msg.payload);
return null;
